Disease.Name: ADRENOLEUKODYSTROPHY, X-LINKED
Disease.Synonym: ADDISON DISEASE AND CEREBRAL SCLEROSIS; ADRENOLEUKODYSTROPHY, X-LINKED; ADDISON DISEASE AND CEREBRAL SCLEROSIS
Disease.Summary: rare (1:17000) ;X-linked recessive;USA: 1:42,000 (hemizygotes), 1:16,800 (hemizygotes plus heterozygotes) [Bezman et al. 2001] X-linked therapy: diet with Lorenzos oil - glycerol trioleate - glyceryl trierucate oil bone marrow transplantation (experimental)

symtomp.symptom: behavior, abnormal or bizarre, confusion / behaviour, abnormal or bizarre
behavior, hyperactive, restless / behaviour, hyperactive, restless
eye defect beginning in infancy or childhood
